quote: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win. – Stephen King
fact: Mercury is the only planet whose orbit is coplanar with its equator.
joke: I had a pair of racing snails. I removed their shells to make them more aerodynamic, but they became sluggish.
